name: The Dark Avatar
description:
2000 years into the future, the balance between light and darkness has been tilted. Darkness has overtaken the world causing creatures from the dark dimension to cross to earth, thereby banishing them from the plane of existence. You're a husk who was given life and a purpose. Discover what caused the disruption and restore the balance.

Battle your way through foes, and other Avatars and become the dark avatar

Made for Geopipe game jam

Mission

Navigate the city

Banish enemies to the dark dimension

interact with the crystals to show you light

close the portals to lighten the world

Instruction

Download the zip file

Extract the content

Open the .exe file

Enjoy the game

Credits

This game was made for the $2500 NYC GameJam using a 3D model of a section of New York City, which was provided at https://www.geopipe.ai/
